div.p: Attached are two tables that give an overview of the mappings between the eLTSS Dataset and FHIR.

tr.td: Mapping of the eLTSS Dataset to FHIR Release 4 Resources.

td.a: eLTSS Dataset to FHIR USCore Implementation Guide

tr.td: Mapping of the eLTSS Dataset to the FHIR USCore Implementation Guide v3.0.0 Profiles.

div.p: For an MS Excel version of the mappings, please refer to the HL7 CBCP Documents page.
